channel.title: §¶ RuneScape §¶
channel.description:
[center] [size=16pt]CONTACT ME VIA MSN Messenger: sanedevelopment@hotmail.com[/size] I have Permission from sane to post this We have started a development team together. My MSN th3_big_p1mp@hotmail.com [size=15pt]Server Open for Members of the Development Team and Members runescape95.no-ip.org [/size] [IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x13/Hutch335/phat.gif[/img]I Am the creator of Aeroscape as known on there as "SANE" and on [url=http://Moparscape.org/smf]Moparscape.org/smf[/url] as "SANE"[IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x13/Hutch335/phat.gif[/img] Anyways I have recently shut down the server Aeroscape with over 7k Charactor files in the first 2 weeks. Why did i do this? Because I had no time to run this server I am currently in the progress of trying to get a Dedicated server however i dont do the little Paypal thing.... So i CANT. Ok well.. I have decided to start a Community/Development team of a server. Called RuneScape (may change name due to popular Demand) I currently have no one working on this project with me so I said what the heck why not let the good people at Mopar Help me. :rolleyes: [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w225/Nintailfox70/av-15.gif[/img] Ok well heres what will happen. Currently I do have a source and unless someone announces a better one we will be using the one I have chosen (Swatscape) Thanks for the post Swat. I have added in more of Silabs items into this source so now there is about 300-350 working silabs items additional to that of the normal server, If you follow me.
[size=13pt]Please notice all of the people who apply for JOBS WILL get admin in game HOWEVER! They will NOT be aloud on there admin accounts unless they are testing. Admins cannot make trades drop items or KILL ANYONE! THE SERVER WILL not let you. Admin accounts are souly for testing ONLY![/size]
[size=16pt]DEVELOPMENT[/size] For the team I will need 40-50 people. Low rep? Dont worry rep doesnt mean anything. Heres the positions we will be Needing
[size=12pt]Server Programmer[/size] ( Just fixes up and puts things in the correct spot ) - - -
[size=12pt]NPC Drop Tech[/size] ( Adds NPC's into Autospawn.cfg and add the drop rates and items with them ) - - - - - - [size=12pt]Object Tech[/size] ( Adds and removes objects in globalObjects ) - - - - - - [size=12pt]Item.Java Tech[/size] ( Adds silabs items into the correct spot into item.java EASY SPOT ) - Cryme Time - -
[size=12pt]Command Creator[/size] ( Pretty easy they just add commands so we can mass produce new items into game ) - Cryme Time - -
[size=12pt]Forum Designer/Forum Hoster[/size] ( Hosts the forums on a co.nr or .com domain This spot will get an auto Admin if done well ) Pimping One [size=12pt]Clan Choreographer[/size] ( Plans out how the clan system will work and they run the CLAN part of the forums ) - - [size=12pt]Report Abuse Team[/size] ( I will patch them the logs threw xampp to View and inform me of the reports IMPORTANT JOB ) - - - - [size=12pt]Website Designer[/size] ( Must run a Freewebs or other site to go with forums. This MUST BE DONE WELL There must be a link to the forums on this site along with other details. Will get AUTO ADMIN if done correctly. ) - [size=12pt]XAMP[/size] ( They must know how to post files on there so it can be remotly accesed from other people so They can change the things without me sending them it. Kinda like MYSQL or whatever it is I use to know how to do this but havent done it in a wile Will get huge benifits in game ) - [size=12pt]Dedicated[/size] ( This is not a required job but well apreciated This person must get a dedicated server to run it at least 17/7 17 hours 7 days a week. They will get automatic member statis and many many benifits in game! ) - [size=12pt]Shops.CFG/npchandler.java[/size] ( They must add items into shops MUST RUN it by with The TH Team members FIRST! and then they add the talking and what not into npchandler ) - - - [size=12pt]TH Team[/size] ( Brainstorm of Ideas and ask me for my opinion They also are the ones I tell to tell any members what to do This team will BE HANDPICKED BY ME in the first day of running. ) - - - [size=12pt]Minigame Tech [/size]( Will think of the mini games AND WRITE A CODE FOR THEM must be done VERY well. ) - - - - [size=12pt]Update Supervisor[/size] ( Very easy they just think of updates and how they would go about adding them in. ) - - -
Ok that pretty much concluded the Jobs as of now. I will be adding many more jobs so if there full dont be sad.
[size=15pt]Things PLANNING ON DOING WITH TEAM[/size]
-Adding Membership ( People will pay for members with Forum Credits read on ) -Forum Credit System ( Must add some way of giving people credits on the forums for helping people/Reffering people/Anything else and just getting people to join(the one to figure out a way for this will be awarded MASSIVELY!)) -Move objects around to create a unique starting area with decent things. -Seperate places one place for members other for non members -Members and non members items -Custom MiniGames see minigame tech job -Some sort of clan system -Run server on MYSQL -Have highscore page on MYSQL to link with the forums. GIVE ME MORE IDEAS! ESTIMATED TIME DOING POST: 54 Minutes Ok thats what I have as of now. This will start up as soon as possible.
Use this to Sign up
[code]Position wanted: Experience in that position: Name in Real life: Age: MSN: Show Proof (no proof = Declined ):[/code]
[/center]

item.title: §¶ RuneScape §¶
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“pimping one, post:17, topic:157805”][quote author=Aff link=topic=215129.msg1876747#msg1876747 date=1194586577]
The more programmers there are, the less of a chance it’ll be finished… Jagex only needed like 10-15 people to create a game that a team of 100 couldn’t even make. So you’re expecting 40-50 people to be greater than 10-15 of great programmers who have years of knowledge? You are wrong, my friend. You’re better off with 8 elite Programmers than 40-50 total noob programmers, because MSCP only has about 10.
[/quote]
True. and Jagex also have game modelers they can make objects we dont have that knowledge we just take silabs easy route and copy what they have -.-[/quote]

Get 10 elite programmers, create your own models and make a server that passes Runescape in players, stability, and much, much more.

Read full topic
